methods.name: CameraMode
methods.description: Returns the current camera mode, showing how the client will move the camera by default

methods.name: CameraEvent
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified yaw

methods.name: getCameraMode
methods.description: Returns the current camera mode, showing how the client will move the camera by default

methods.name: getPitch
methods.description: Gets the pitch of the camera

methods.name: getYaw
methods.description: Gets the yaw of the camera

methods.name: getX
methods.description: Gets the X of the camera

methods.name: getY
methods.description: Gets the Y of the camera

methods.name: getZ
methods.description: Gets the Z of the camera

methods.name: getZoom
methods.description: Gets the camera's current zoom level

methods.name: getLowestPitch
methods.description: Gets the lowest availble pitch Recently updated to just be a flat 128

methods.name: firePitchAndYawEvent
methods.signature: public static void firePitchAndYawEvent​(int pitch, int yaw)
methods.description: Fires the RuneScriptEvent to change camera pitch/yaw Does not verify your inputs

methods.name: fireZoomEvent
methods.description: Fires the RuneScriptEvent to change camera zoom Does not verify your inputs

methods.name: setZoom
methods.description: Sets the camera's zoom level using the scroll wheel If the scrolling overshoots the target zoom level, the method will not re-adjust but the method may still return false if it overshoots by too far.

methods.name: rotateToEntity
methods.description: Rotates the camera to face an entity

methods.name: rotateToTile
methods.description: Rotates the camera to face a tile

methods.name: rotateTo
methods.signature: public static boolean rotateTo​(int yaw, int pitch)
methods.description: Rotates camera to a particular yaw and pitch

methods.name: rotateToYaw
methods.description: Rotates camera yaw to specified angle

methods.name: rotateToPitch
methods.description: Rotates camera pitch to specified angle

methods.name: mouseRotateToEntity
methods.description: Rotates camera to face an entity by using the mouse scroll wheel

methods.name: mouseRotateToTile
methods.description: Rotates camera to face a tile by using the mouse scroll wheel

methods.name: mouseRotateTo
methods.signature: public static boolean mouseRotateTo​(int yaw, int pitch)
methods.description: Rotates camera to a particular yaw and pitch using the mouse scroll wheel

methods.name: mouseRotateToYaw
methods.description: Rotates camera yaw to specified angle using the mouse scroll wheel

methods.name: mouseRotateToPitch
methods.description: Rotates camera pitch to specified angle using the mouse scroll wheel

methods.name: keyboardRotateToEntity
methods.description: Rotates camera to face an entity by using the keyboard

methods.name: keyboardRotateToTile
methods.description: Rotates camera to face a tile by using the keyboard

methods.name: keyboardRotateTo
methods.signature: public static boolean keyboardRotateTo​(int yaw, int pitch)
methods.description: Rotates camera to a particular yaw and pitch using the keyboard

methods.name: keyboardRotateToYaw
methods.description: Rotates camera yaw to specified angle using the keyboard

methods.name: keyboardRotateToPitch
methods.description: Rotates camera pitch to specified angle using the keyboard

methods.name: rotateToEntityEvent
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified entity

methods.name: rotateToTileEvent
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified tile

methods.name: rotateToEvent
methods.signature: public static CameraEvent rotateToEvent​(int yaw, int pitch)
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified yaw and pitch

methods.name: rotateToYawEvent
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified yaw

methods.name: rotateToPitchEvent
methods.description: Generates and runs a CameraEvent to rotate camera to specified pitch

methods.name: getYawForTile
methods.description: Gets the yaw required to view the given tile

methods.name: getYawForEntity
methods.description: Gets the yaw required to look at the given entity See getYawForTile(Tile) where the tile is Entity.getTile()

methods.name: getPitchForTile
methods.description: Gets the pitch required to look at the given Tile

methods.name: getPitchForEntity
methods.description: Gets the pitch required to look at the given entity See getPitchForTile(Tile) where the tile is Entity.getTile()

methods.name: getMaxZoom
methods.description: Gets the maximum zoom value, this is the value representing being zoomed all the way out

methods.name: getMinZoom
methods.description: Gets the minimum zoom value, this is the value representing being zoomed all the way in.
